law.text:
An appeal to the appropriate court may be taken from a final order, decree, or judgment of a court made under this subtitle:
that debars a claimant from further proceeding against the Fund or denies the claim;
that awards the claimant less than that to which the claimant believes the claimant is entitled; or
except as provided in § 20-605 of this subtitle, that causes the defendant, the uninsured party, the Fund, or other party to be aggrieved.
